lead_paragraph: Georgia has agreed to pay a settlement to Ashley Diamond, the transgender woman who sued officials last year for failing to provide her necessary medical treatment.

headline.print_headline: Georgia: State to Pay Transgender Inmate
headline.main: Georgia: State to Pay Transgender Inmate

snippet: Georgia has agreed to pay a settlement to Ashley Diamond, the transgender woman who sued officials last year for failing to provide her necessary medical treatment.
abstract: Georgia Dept of Corrections agrees to settlement of over $250,000 with transgender woman Ashley Diamond, who sued state for her treatment when she was incarcerated in male prisons; Diamond claimed she was not provided with necessary medical treatment and was raped multiple times.
